i1.name: Hextech Affinity
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Heimerdinger''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while near allied {{tip|turret|turrets}} or his {{ai|H-28G Evolution Turret|Heimerdinger|icononly=yes}} {{ai|H-28Q Apex Turret|Heimerdinger|icononly=yes}} [[Heimerdinger#Pets|own]].

r1.name: UPGRADE!!!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Heimerdinger''' empowers his next basic [[Champion ability|ability]], placing it on the same {{sti|cooldown}} as its basic form, modifying its damage and making it {{tt|free to cast|Does not consume mana}}. ''UPGRADE!!!'' can be recast after 3 seconds.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Heimerdinger''' ends ''UPGRADE!!!'' and puts it on a 3-second cooldown.
''UPGRADE!!! can be used while affected by {{tip|crowd control}}.''
r1.notes:
*Toggle abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}}, charging {{ii|Spellbinder}}, and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Consuming the buff for an empowered basic [[Champion ability|ability]] does.
* No compensations for {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} are made if ''UPGRADE!!!'' is recast.
